tweet: At 21:44:51 UTC today, we’ll again deprecate d by further 0.2, to 0.68. The #Cardano community will become responsible for 32% of blocks minted in epoch 218. Steadily and surely, the road to full network decentralization continues, epoch by epoch @Cardano
